attributes.review: download this app to support my Oompa Loompa king. But when I downloaded it I was ambushed with pictures of his little turtle *wink wink*. I felt very uncomfortable and very unsafe and feared for my mental health and well being. Then things got worse my skin started changing colors and my hair started to look like a worm on my head. I started turning into him. Very scary. But the worse part was when little trump babies started crawling around my house screaming TRUMP 2020. It was very very terrifying. I have to go to counseling twice a week for my ptsd. Trump has scared me for life. And I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll ever fully recover

attributes.review: so i downloaded the app because i was curious about how it worked and what trump was going to do to save our country and as soon as i scanned my face id the app downloaded and said i wasn't welcome, as i am not a straight white male. it said that if i didn't get everyone i know to vote for trump he would give us all coronavirus. i closed the app and went outside to do yard work and these ninjas all dressed in white with pointy hats said that they would burn me? if i didn't do everything in my power to help trump win the election:/ i am now hanging upside down from the tree writing this review on fire because i refused to help trump win. it's pretty hot here and i'm getting very lightheaded and it's getting very dark. anyway y'all should take this app off the app store because i don't like ninjas and they also store your location even when the app is not on.
attributes.title: scary ninjas dressed in white with pointy hats:(

attributes.review:

Also, where‚Äôs Melania? Is she okay? I feel like we haven‚Äôt heard from her.... does she need to be rescued?
